channel.title: Python, Web Scraping, Vector Databases | Named After Numeral

item.title: Python GPT Crawler
item.description: A GPT knowledge file web crawler in base python. Inspired by Builder IO’s and the by A-baoYang, I decided to create my own version which is a bit lighter on prerequisites. Despite the prior works being very accessible, installing any combination of node, chromium, and playwright can be a pain if your hosting provider does not support installing these dependencies. Therefore, I rewrote the project using only Python’s os, requests, and beautifulsoup4 libraries.
